deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 57 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: Concentrated with 3X powerful stain fighters in every load vs. leading value detergent. This formulation uses less water than the prior formula, which means that you can expect a power-packed clean out of every bottle and great results on wash day

Deep clean with few ingredients. Powerful dye-free concentrated liquid laundry detergent has a hardworking cleaner, active stain remover, ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, laundry booster, water softener, and a gentle fragrance

This clean and simple laundry detergent meets U.S. EPA Safer Choice product standards to be safer for people, pets, and the planet. Free from unnecessary chemicals, dyes, phosphates, GMOs, added preservatives, brighteners or parabens

New look, same Clean & Simple. While we've updated our look, ARM & HAMMER Clean & Simple is still the same liquid laundry detergent you've come to know and love for delivering a powerful clean for your clothes at a smart low price

Works in all machines & all temperatures. This liquid laundry detergent is ideal for cold water laundry loads and as a High Efficiency (HE) laundry detergent liquid. Delivers a powerful clean in cold water. Also biodegradable and safe for septic systems
body.description: ARM & HAMMER Clean & Simple Liquid Laundry Detergent delivers a deep clean with few ingredients. It’s also concentrated with 2X powerful stain fighters in every drop vs. the leading bargain detergent. This one-of-a-kind detergent has 6 essential ingredients†— a hardworking cleaner, an active stain remover, Baking Soda, a laundry booster, a water softener and a gentle fragrance. If you’re looking for a laundry liquid that is not tested on animals, ARM & HAMMER Clean & Simple is an ideal pick. This laundry detergent also meets EPA Safer Choice product standards to be safer for people, pets and the planet. It’s a clean & simple wash detergent that’s free from unnecessary chemicals so there are no dyes, phosphates, GMOs, added preservatives, brighteners or parabens. Many of our laundry, cat litter, toothpastes and personal care products are made with ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, delivering the quality you can count on, from the brand you trust. Versatile and affordable, for generations of families, ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda has been the standard of purity, and a trusted household staple in millions of cabinets and pantries. We’ve updated the look of this laundry washing detergent, but its formula is the same one that delivers a deep clean for your clothes. (†and water)
